alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 12:22PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rockingham and southeastern Hillsborough Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1221 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pelham, or near Salem, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Derry, Salem, Epping, Brentwood, Hudson, Pelham, Londonderry, Hampstead, Atkinson, Kingston, Chester, Danville, Fremont, East Kingston, Kensington, Windham, Sandown, Plaistow, Newton and South Hampton. This includes Interstate 93 between mile markers 1 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham
